name: Escape Together (itch) (Prakho)
description:
Tom and Tod are two cubes stuck in this building, help them get out.
If they stay near each other they have higher walk speed, fly speed and 
weight. 
Controls:
WAD for Tod(red) press w repeatedly.
IJL for Tom(blue) press i repeatedly.

Single player can play this game.

This game can also be played by 2 players.

You are only allowed to press w and i 20 times.
 you need to rest on platform to start flying again.
 there are weak platform(platform on only one cube can rest)
and strong platform(both can rest).
